content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my front yard taking my puppy to go potty.I looked up and saw white lights on over 10 objects and one object with a flashing red light.They were moving slowly abd then sped up. my camera was not good enough to get pictures.I thought they were helicopters and i'm nor sure now that they were not.I lost sight of them when they disappeared behind the clouds and i got scares and went inside.
content.summary: At leat 10 lights and one flashing red light

content.detailedDescription: I was driving up state road 15 coming back to goshen from warsaw.  i saw a craft that looked like a plane, however, as i drove by i watched it stop and hover over an area that has been under construction for several years.  after i drove past the craft flew away to the east at a slow speed that is not normal for a plane.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like plane.  move very different from any plane known.  hovered and turned 90° with no problem.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok. so i'm not 100% sure what i saw. i am a pretty scientificly literate person. i am going to explain what i saw in the best detail i can. mid-february sometime, i'm driving along the 101 highway near the vermont exit in la. it's raining sort of heavy and all of the cars are going about 10-25mph. i see an object floating in the distance. it gets my attention because it's not moving at all, it's completely frozen/locked in position. mind you it was pretty windy and raining (rare in la). i squint to see what it is but can't make out any details. at first i thought it was a balloon but a balloon would've been moving with the weather. as i drove closer i pass under a bridge it comes in to view about 50 feet over the next bridge. as i drive closer i see this object. the best way to describe it would be 3-5 balls in a vertical row connected to a central line that was not visible (imagine 2 balls on the left of the line,3 on the right). the balls were literally merging and crisscrossing into each other repeatedly. they were all metallic looking and i remember seeing red, a darkish blue and dark silver colors. the rate at which these balls were merging was completely against the environment and unlike anything i've ever seen. the merging was slow and rhythmic. kind of like a 1,2,3,4  of a waltz but half time. i looked to see a line, maybe something it was connected to and saw nothing. as i got closer those details got clearer to the point where i could actually see the balls enter into each other and coming out on the other side. i passed under the bridge it was floating over and never seen it again.
being a very sane person and someone who deeply values science and the scientific method i have been troubled by not being able to express exactly what it is i saw. i live in los angeles and drive on this highway all the time. i've never seen pictures or heard stories of anything like it. thanks for having somewhere i can put it down it writing.
content.summary: Shapeshifiting balls possible ufo

content.detailedDescription:
On monday, march 27th at 8:26pm, i was seeing my sister off as she and my niece were getting into their car to head home.
it was then that i noticed a bright light hovering and coming from across the street; it was then that i noticed a very bright orb hovering over our heads and steadily traveling in a constant direction (west).
the light remained constant, never flickering in and out as it traveled across the night's sky, seeming to have a mind of its own and knowing where it's ultimate destination was to be.
family and i watched this object until it crossed over several homes, disappearing behind a very large/tower building.

*2.5 minute video recorded*
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light came from over the trees across the street from home; brightened as it traveled through sky

content.detailedDescription: While my son and i were getting the telescope ready, i felt the need to hurry up and get out there. but when we walked outside there was a very large and bright "star" very close to our home. i grabbed the ipad and started to take pictures. it stayed for a few hours, i went back out at midnight and it was gone.
content.summary: My son and i took the telescope outside to try and observe a comet, but instead there was a very large and bright object east of the big dipper. it didn't feel like a star, and it was too close to be a star.  i felt an urgent need to go outside right befo

content.detailedDescription: On april 2 2017 at approximately 8:00pm i was observing a live video of my front yard and noticed a small star like white light in the western sky 37 seconds into the video. the light moves to the left in a straight line and then changes direction and head to the right (south) in a straight line and disappears.
content.summary: Video recording of a light in the sky that changes direction

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a basement bedroom with a concrete floor. i was lying on a queen-size mattress with box springs , which was on a metal frame with legs. there was a toaster sitting on the concrete about two feet away from my head. i had an interview the next morning but couldn't sleep , as i was nervous and my heart was pounding. as i lay there , i suddenly became aware that there was someone else in the room , but it felt like they had stepped into my mind and were observing. at this point , i tried to move so i could see it. i could not move.As i struggled to move , the coils in the toaster began vibrating , and the harder i struggled , the coils in the toaster would vibrate at a higher pitch. finally , i was able to break free , and in one motion , i grabbed my loaded 1911 colt with my left hand as i sat up in bed. i observed a light brighter than the sun in the basement outside my door as it moved away from the bedroom , took a left turn , went up the stairs and through the glass in the stairwell. i looked behind me to see another light with the same intensity move up and away from the window well. i didn't observe the source of the light directly , but you could tell what they were doing. i got up and turned on the light and sat there for about a half hour before i laid back down , this time putting my 1911 under my pillow.
  about half an hour later , around 2 am , i felt the same presence in my mind. this time , i laughed out loud because i knew who it was and thought it would be easy enough to break free as i did earlier. i struggled to move , but this time , they were immobilizing me with a higher frequency , and the coils in the toaster were vibrating at a very high pitch. but i was determined to at least see what or who was doing this , and finally was able to move my head enough to see a grey alien partially phased though the ceiling tile staring at me. the room was dimly lit , but enough for a good look. i have to believe it let me move to look at it , as they were prepared for me the second time. after a quick look , the room went dark and it disappeared.
content.summary: I was unable to sleep and was almost abducted by a grey alien

content.detailedDescription: Witness father contacted mufon investigator advising there were 8 or 9 pill shaped objects over the city of summitville indiana at approx. 10 p.M., objects were white in color hovering over the city. actual witness took cell phone photos. cell phone was effected by the event and kept rebooting. neighbors were also witnesses to the event.
content.summary: Witness advised 8-9 pill shaped objects hovering over the city

content.detailedDescription:
Saw object then it approached me and had a sparkler like apendage coming out of it. after that, my next memory is that 2 hours are unaccounted for.
the exact location is the back deck on my home in phelps, wisconsin.
content.summary: See below.

content.detailedDescription: I was at the corner of allegheny and kensington in philadelphia waiting for the bus. it was approximately 8 am on 4/3/17  it was a lovely morning and i was looking at the sky and clouds and saw a black object quite high.  i was facing north/northwest.  my first thought was that it was some debris floating on the air currents -  but it was not just floating along  - it was moving quite slowly from east to west.  the object was dark black, shaped like a wide diamond – or a square object on a corner.  it did not appear to reflect light – however i noticed a light that flashed about 4 times in the 10 minutes or so i was looking at it.   i asked a young woman , also waiting for the bus if she saw it – she said yes -  i asked her if it looked like a helicopter?  she said she didn’t think so.  i’m afraid i didn’t get her name, but if i see her again i will ask.  i did try to take some photos – but i don’t believe they show much since the object was so high up and i’d think, quite distant.  i'm attaching the photos from my phone.
content.summary: Black - square of diamond shaped - flashed white light a few times - or was reflecting light

content.detailedDescription:
My cousins used to come from out of state to visit us when i was young. i was about 7 at the time. we lived in a large, old house with real wooden doors which were very loud and very heavy. the cousin closest to my age (he was probably 10 or 11) and i would sleep in sleeping bags in the living room while his parents used my bed and his older brothers used the guest room. on one such night my cousin had awoken during the night (he recounted the next morning) because he heard a high pitched humming similar to the noise you hear before fainting. he had discovered me missing. i wasn't in my sleeping bag nor was anyone in the restroom or kitchen. he quietly poked around to look. he also said he remembers lightening flashes and feeling electricity in the air which made his hair stand on end. i told him i didn't remember getting up to go anywhere at all, though i woke up with my head in the foot end of the sleeping bag with a painful "bug bite" at the base of my skull in the back. being young i remembered nothing of this until fairly recently. i have noticed when in a natural body of water such as a lake, if i am submerged to my chin i can hear a faint clicking or ticking noise coming from within the base of my skull. it is also worth noting i am always very congested in one of my nostrils but always in my throat. i also get these "spasms" for lack of a better word. i get a weird tickling biting feeling that starts in my upper neck and rolls to my right shoulder causing me to "short circuit" as my husband calls it. my head curls in toward my right shoulder which curls up toward my ear. my head shakes a little as does the shoulder. it always seems to happen unprovoked. despite being constantly congested i have a very accute sense of smell. sometimes when out in the open i get this all consuming urge to run in a certain direction (i never have for fear of what i might run to!) 
being so young i cannot remember if it was before or after this event but i remember lying in my actual bed on my stomach (my usual way of sleeping) and awakening suddenly. i could feel the presence of men around me, i could almost hear what they were saying but their voices seemed far off or just barely inaudible. i couldn't move to look at them or to do anything else really. i felt like i was being pinched and prodded maybe cut.. zapped sometimes even. all of it seemed like it should hurt but for some reason i was comfortable with it rather than frightened. the mumbling was reassuring even though i couldn't make it out. shortly thereafter, maybe a few days have passed, i wake up on my back which is highly unusual. i'm not a back sleeper. not only that but i'm upside down again with my head under the covers at the foot of the bed, feet on my pillow. after i realize where i am i crawl back up to the proper position and am immediately struck by the same immobility i mentioned previously. two large eyes, not a whole face or even a head just eyes, were floating right in my line of sight. i believe they were black but they might have been navy; solid though not only the iris. i remember hearing a word whispered. it sounded like it was coming from within my own head, but not in my own voice. it was a raspy voice that just said "remember... remember...Remember..." i was scared this time and struggling to make noise or break free from the paralysis but i could not. eventually i just thought "i will! i'll remember!" and the eyes were gone and i was no longer paralyzed or afraid.
content.summary: I reportedly vanished in the middle of the night without a trace and woke up facing the wrong way in my sleeping bag

content.detailedDescription:
(514) 481-7159

i was watching the news reports with my girlfriend and there was a container ship that they were talking about and right above on the right you can see the sun and it had a black ring around the sun. and they did not talk about the ring around the sun and that made me really wonder and made me really surprised also because it's quite obvious like a sore thumb.
content.summary: It was a black ring around the sun

content.detailedDescription: I was in the bathroom looking out the window. at first i thought a big bright firefly. but this is early april and just one. then it went off and came back on very bright. this happened four times. whatever it was it flew in straight path from right to left and it disappeared around the house.
content.summary: It looked like a bright firefly flying in a straight line by the trees.

content.detailedDescription: Fell from sky like shooting star and then turns up 100ft from the ground and hovered and stared to sparkle . as it sparkles it contracts form 1ft. to 3ft then shots up in to the sky as if it went in to a warp hole ...
content.summary: Fell from sky like shooting star and then turns up 100ft from the ground and hovered and stared to sparkle . as it sparkles it contracts form 1ft. to 3ft then shots up in to the sky as if it went in to a warp hole ...

content.detailedDescription: Fell from sky like shooting star and then turns up 100ft from the ground and hovered and stared to sparkle . as it sparkles it contracts form 1ft. to 3ft then shots up in to the sky as if it went in to a warp hole ...
content.summary: Fell from sky like shooting star and then turns up 100ft from the ground and hovered and stared to sparkle . as it sparkles it contracts form 1ft. to 3ft then shots up in to the sky as if it went in to a warp hole ...

content.detailedDescription:
My neighbor called me to come outside he was taking his dogs out. he said and i quote " you gotta come outside and see this sh*t". i went out and looked up and there it was near both our homes. 3 blinking lights making a continuance flash ever time. it was a black triangle moving east with no sound at a steady slow pace with no sound. i am a retired af technical sgt and i have been around aircraft for over 22 years. this was very strange. i had seen the same thing 5 years ago in april except there were 2 of them translucent and could only be seen when the lightening lit up the sky, a person in atlanta reported the same thing i saw only 1 1/2 hours after i saw it.
regards,
dale smith
usaf retired
content.summary: Neighbor called  me he asked me to go outside, there it was.

content.detailedDescription: Walked out on deck to take picture of lake. uploaded picture to facebook and noticed a wooden cross in sky on picture   went back to take a  look and it was gone.  i see it in the picture and know it was there.I think while i was taking picture i remember seeing what at aaa quick  glance ,some birds.  i am not totally sure of this.
content.summary: Wooden cross in sky

content.detailedDescription: I saw a very bright light (star like) very high in the sky. it looked like a star but it was moving. it was moving in a straight line for sometime when it began to zig-zag across the sky for very large distances. the it came back on the same line it had been flying and began the move straight again. the it dropped like a stone for a great distance and then it rose back to the same spot it dropped from. it began to fly straight again and then it took off at a very high speed straight up in the sky. i had reported it to the od and they laugh at me.
content.summary: In the night sky over ft. gordon, ga. i was in training at this time.

content.city: ตำบล สุรนารี

Grey boomerang in sky. 

dear bob spearing
         i can answer your questions but some questions may be not clear, i will directly  answer.

3. 2 ( me and my girlfriend)
4. this question is difficult to answer but it so big and may be same level with cloud

6. from question 4 i saw that so big ( i am not sure its attitude but quite near me and it is bigger than boeing about 10 times up) and that still keep boomerang shape across the sky when i see
7. it take 1-2 minites to across the sky ( i time from i see to i cannot see) and its move in same velocity

content.detailedDescription: I was returning home at around 4:15am, from getting some coffee. i got out of my car in my driveway, and saw a bright, pulsing, white light, in the sky to the south. i went inside and got my infrared binoculars and filmed it. couldn't really see what it was.....Until i went frame by frame, while reviewing the video. it shape shifted. it was a triangle, a sphere, a disc, and other shapes. also, when looking at the video, for a few minutes, i saw another pulsating, white light, further south. unbelievable.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sphere craft w/3 white pulsating lights, in the middle, hopping around, and shape shifting.

content.detailedDescription:
Okay.  so, about a month ago, i saw a single disc (like a slightly-flattened football; glowing and translucent) make a very rapid landing in the vicinity of fort campbell.  

i reported that one, here, as well.

tonight, while looking out my kitchen window, i saw two craft, also translucent but with a darker, more pronounced form, perform the same type of landing maneuver.  very rapidly descending at an angle ...

what the heck is going on at fort campbell? 

oh ... i found another report about a ufo at fort campbell at the same time as the first report i filed ... and that guy was across town... so i'm absolutely sure it happened.
content.summary: Something weird is going on at fort campbell

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the garden going to get some washing out of our tumble dryer that is in shed looked up saw the cresent moon and to the left 3 stars caught my eye they were moving together in same direction then they split going in different directions. they were going as quick as a bowing at 2000ft but not sure of the hight of these stars.
i shouted to my wife to poke her head out and look as 1 was going over our house i waved as it went over and got brighter and carried on did it just communicate or coincidence my wife banned me from garden tonight.Its not the first time we have seen these. was like they are searching for something.
content.summary: 3 stars searching split up

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping awoke by a bright light coming into my window. i couldnt move any part of my body. i looked away then back towards my side of the bed and there was an entity in what appeared to be a haz mat suit standing over me. i fell asleep and awoke again not being able to move at first then slowly was able to get up and go to the bathroom. two nights later the same thing, bright lights and entity except not in a hazmat type suit appeared it looked as though a cross between et and a grey same thing fell asleep woke up and slowly was able to move...I had to draw a picture the next dayand still have it. fast forward i started having health issues after that and was diagnosed with an autoimmune disease.
content.summary: Visitation

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting g outside in our carport approx 9pm before going to bed. we both saw at same time star like object over neighbors house toward the west. it changed colors overs span of 10 seconds white then blue green the orange red solid. then abruptly started off to the north west. it was close enough for us to hear any possible engine noise. there was none.... and no noise in our area at all. very strange movement.....Moved rapidly away from a hover.....No lie....Weboth saw it.
content.summary: Wife and i saw starlike object very right change colors white blue green orange then no sound moved to nw fast

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving eastbound on i-20 about 15 miles east of meridian, mississippi when i observed through the windshield a white egg flying over the freeway.  it crossed the road from north to south and disappeared behind the trees  the interstate there has tall trees on both sides. i checked my odometer and estimate that it crossed about 2 miles in front of me.  i had hoped to see it again when i got to where i estimated it crossed but it was gone behind the tall pine trees to the south of the road.  the weather was mostly clear with some puffy clouds. i knew exactly what it was because i had seen another just like it pass over my driveway in tennessee a couple of months before.

traffic was moderate so it is possible that other people might have seen it.  a lot of people never pay attention to the sky.  i scan the sky all the time.  there are a lot of interesting things to see there.  it had been 45 years since i last saw a ufo and then saw two in less than 3 months.
content.summary: Ufo flew over i-20 from n to s

content.detailedDescription:
i was working on one of my old cars when i went outside to look at a part in better light.  i noticed an object just behind the tree line to the west of my property and thought it was a sailplane.  as i went back into the garage i realized i could not hear the usual putt-putt of the sailplane engine so i went back out and looked harder.  it came over the trees and passed almost directly overhead.  i could observe the front, left side, back and a portion of the top (because of the curvature of the egg)as it slowly flew past.  i estimate the speed was about 40 mph.  there were no ports, projections, engines, props, gondolas, lines, or sound.  it was eggshell white and shaped like an egg.  as i stood in my driveway and watched it slowly passed over the treeline to the east and was gone. its course was wsw to ene. 
it appeared the size of a softball held at arms length.  i knew it was a ufo as soon as i realized that it was not a sailplane or a balloon.  the weather was partly cloudy, white puffy clouds with blue sky in between.  my reaction was that it was the first ufo i had seen since aug. 17, 1972 when i saw one do impossible maneuvering in the sky. after it went out of view over the east treeline i went back into the garage and continued work on my old car. when you know of their existence you are not surprised to see one. 
 is this something out of groom lake or is it from farther away?
content.summary: Came over tree line right over my garage, in view 40 seconds before flying over east tree line

content.detailedDescription: It was about 1:30am, april 2nd, and i was walking back to my room from camping. as i'm walking, i'm looking up at the sky and admiring the stars, as it was a perfectly clear night. i get about 150 yards from my building when out of nowhere appears two red-orange orbs, flying from south to north at an incredibly fast speed (it probably took about four seconds for them to traverse the entirety of the sky). at first, i thought the objects might be a satellite, but they were far too large, and i've never seen satellites fly parallel to one another. then i thought it must be a plane, but the lights were travelling far too quickly to ever be a high-flying plane, and there was no sound coming from them, so it couldn't have been a low-flying plane either. during the event, i was mostly amazed. i had no idea what i was seeing, but it was absolutely incredible seeing two unwavering lights flying so fast in such perfect unison. i reacted by first standing there and seeing if anyone was around to see what i just witnessed. then, i proceeded to text a bunch of friends to describe what i had just seen. i was in a state of complete disbelief. i lost sight of the objects after about four seconds. they entered my view from the south, travelled in a straight line at an incredible speed, and disappeared earlier than would have seemed normal in the northern sky. i saw the objects both appear and disapper.
content.summary: 2 relatively large red-orange orbs flying in parallel, one slightly ahead of the other, going incredibly fast from south to north

content.detailedDescription:
on the morning of march 30th, 2017 greene county, alabama cattle farmer discovered 26 of his cows had mysteriously died. one has been sent to auburn university for cause of death.
  adjacent farmers have heard a humming sound all night causing dogs to bark all night, as well as cats acting weird.

  last night , cattle farmers reported their cows strangely bellowing all night with the dogs barking. horses at a horse barn( open ended) would not come out to feed in pasture.

  dead cows off greene county highway 138- between eutaw & boligee , alabama.

  will forward additional information when available.
content.summary: Read narrative

content.detailedDescription: i was just about to get into my hot tub but i happened to look towards the sky above my roof line south east and i noticed five bright objects descending downwards  and i didn't know what they were at first,  but eventually look like four flares floating down towards the ground and they eventually dissipated, i posted the video on facebook contacted the local newspaper the agassiz harrison observer and left an email, they didn't get back to me  for like a month saying they must've overlooked it. i posted several videos of it on various sites and really gotten much attention, i personally think they were flares  at that time, but why would anyone be setting flares,  i'm sure  other people must've seen it.  and no i wasn't drinking or anything like that,they were very visible and were very bright in the beginning but because my iphone then had fingerprint identification to open it, my hands were wet and took a while to get any video.  i'm sure if you were to look into any aircraft during that night doing any exercises in the area, basically above the kent maximum institution area, there must be a record of it.
content.summary: i was just about to get into my hot tub looking up above my roof line to the sky and saw four bright lights, took me a while to get video because then it was fingerprint identification and my hands were wet

content.detailedDescription: On thursday march 23 at about 8:12pm, i went to the street outside my home to snap a picture of the funny looking slanted cloud formations to the north west just as the sun was going down.  to my amazement, i noticed what appeared to be a partially translucent ( cloaked?) giant cube, and was able to get a picture of it before it disappeared into the clouds.
content.summary: Observed an photographed a large, translucent (partially cloaked?) cube ufo over nw san antonio, tx .
